room_title: Escape room "Baker Street Mystery" by Escape Hour Gig Harbor in Gig Harbor
review: We did the Baker escape as a group of 8 friends. Most of us have been friends for years and this was definitely one of the most fun things we have done. It was laid out well and Kelsey was awesome as a game master. We will be back to do the other challenges soon! We can definitely see how people could get a little addicted to this.

room_title: Escape room "Baker Street Mystery" by Escape Hour Gig Harbor in Gig Harbor
review: I was in a group of 6 and we did the Baker Street Room. It was such a unique activity to do with friends. The clues are difficult, but doable. We made it out of the room with 5 minutes to spare. We'll all be coming back to try the cabin. I can't wait!!! If you're planning on having a meal with your group as well, I recommend doing it afterward because you will want to spend some time talking about the experience! The owners are awesome! Thank you guys, for this unforgettable experience!

room_title: Escape room "Baker Street Mystery" by Escape Hour Gig Harbor in Gig Harbor
review: I've done both the Cabin and Sherlock Holmes rooms and they were great fun. Super challenging and well decorated. The staff are so wonderful and add to the experience. I'd highly recommend going.

room_title: Escape room "Baker Street Mystery" by Escape Hour Gig Harbor in Gig Harbor
review: We had a blast in the Baker Street room. I will for sure be going back again!

room_title: Escape room "Baker Street Mystery" by Escape Hour Gig Harbor in Gig Harbor
review: This place is a blast, well run and with friendly staff. The room we did (Baker Street) was just the right amount of difficult. We didn't finish but definitely looking forward to trying again!
